description: Vogent Voice AI platform - build, test, and deploy conversational voice agents with IVR navigation, webhooks, and API integration.
rules: Generate API keys at https://app.vogent.ai in API Keys section
Webhook signatures use X-Elto-Signature header for HMAC-SHA256 verification
Voice agents require both a prompt and a voice configuration
Use Flow Builder for structured conversation paths with explicit decision points
IVR detection and navigation is available via ivrConfiguration
Voicelab provides ultra-low-latency TTS with Sesame CSM-1B model
